Discovered RCE vulnerability in web application caused by lack of input validation and sanitization on file upload functionality
Crafted malicious PHP file containing reverse shell payload
Uploaded malicious file to server, triggering RCE
Gained remote access to server with shell payload
Exploitation allowed attacker to steal sensitive information, manipulate data, and launch further attacks
Recommended that application implements proper input validation and sanitization on file upload functionality, such as verifying file type and size, scanning for malicious code before execution
